entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as someone who should go back and tell George not to try to enter the house.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as someone who should be told by Fred not to try to enter the house.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone Harry should tell to let them out.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who tries to communicate with Mr. Weasley through the fireplace.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as someone who is trying to enter the house through the fireplace.

relationships.description: Fred informs George not to try to enter the house.
Harry tells Ron that he should let them out.
Harry tries to communicate with Mr. Weasley through the fireplace.
